response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just any commodity; it represents a significant milestone in my journey and carries a personal significance that transcends its monetary value. I understand that the true worth of this product might be subjective and varies from person to person. With that in mind, I am extending to you an exclusive offer to purchase this product at a price of $650,000. This offer is designed to be both fair and reflective of the potential value you might find in it. I believe that by accepting this offer, you will not only own a piece of something special but also contribute to preserving its legacy. Let's make this a win-win situation where both parties can appreciate the value of this product in their own unique ways. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 650000}
